subject: my podracer script
body:
#!/bin/bash
# file: podracer.sh - front-end script for podracer
# to be run as a cron job.
/usr/bin/podracer
if [ -f /$HOME/.podracer/tempsub ]; then
rm $HOME/.podracer/tempsub
fi
